Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of the Board's credibility determination
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Found unreasonable due to speculative findings
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution by NPA and military in the Philippines
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Implausibility findings not supported by evidence
Crimes.Application_Error: Speculative credibility assessment, ignoring key testimony
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Plausibility and consistency under refugee law
Crimes.Application_Factor: Inconsistencies in form vs. context of threats
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRB must provide evidentiary basis for implausibility
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Remanded for reevaluation by different IRB member
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Dismissal of supporting affidavits without justification
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Omissions in form deemed inconsistent without context
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to report extortion to authorities

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Credibility in refugee claim based on unreported extortion
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Impact of non-reporting on credibility assessment
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicants to establish well-founded fear
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Non-reporting due to fear of NPA and military
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Non-reporting does not automatically undermine credibility
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to consider context of non-reporting
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Refugee protection due to extortion and persecution
Crimes.Outcome_on_Merits: Claim not dismissed; referred for reconsideration
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Board failed to fairly assess explanation
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Applicant testimony on fear of retaliation
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Board dismissed claims without proper justification
Crimes.Governing_Rule: Credibility must be assessed in context

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee claim based on extortion and persecution
Crimes.Threat_Source: Armed insurgent group and state military
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Dual threat from non-state and state actors
Crimes.Criminality_Severity: High – ongoing threats to life and safety
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Supported by consistent narrative and corroboration
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: Significant risk to life and security
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Targeted due to political and coercive environment
Crimes.Targeted_Victimization: Family subjected to forced payments and threats
Crimes.Legal_Framework: International refugee law and Canadian IRPA
Crimes.Governing_Law: IRPA and UN Convention Relating to the Status of Refugees
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: IRPA s. 96, Article 1A(2) of Refugee Convention
Crimes.Procedural_Stage: Refugee protection hearing and judicial review
Crimes.Review_Mechanism: Judicial review under Federal Courts Act
